metadata.title: CVE-2023-52525 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mwifiex: Fix oob check condition in mwifiex_process_rx_packetOnly skip the code path trying to access the rfc1042 headers when thebuffer is too small, so the driver can still process packets withoutrfc1042 headers.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
